triangles.name: Triangle of Air
triangles.lore: Breath is the bridge between thought and form. Air carries the whisper of intention.

triangles.name: Triangle of Fire
triangles.lore: Fire transforms. It consumes illusion and reveals the radiant core of being.

triangles.name: Triangle of Water
triangles.lore: Water remembers. It flows through memory, emotion, and the sacred pulse of life.

triangles.name: Triangle of Earth
triangles.lore: Earth holds. It anchors the soul in form, offering stability and sacred geometry.

triangles.name: Triangle of Aether
triangles.lore: Aether is the unseen field. It binds all elements in communion and silence.

triangles.name: Triangle of Metal
triangles.lore: Metal reflects. It is the mirror of karma, forged by discipline and clarity.

triangles.name: Triangle of Wood
triangles.lore: Wood grows. It spirals upward, connecting root to sky in sacred expansion.

triangles.name: Triangle of Light
triangles.lore: Light reveals. It is the language of truth, illuminating the path of the seeker.

triangles.name: Triangle of Shadow
triangles.lore: Shadow conceals. It is the womb of transformation, where the unseen prepares to emerge.
